org.svvrl.goal.core.draw

Class GridlinesDrawer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.draw.AbstractDrawer
      • org.svvrl.goal.core.draw.GridlinesDrawer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener, Drawer

    public class GridlinesDrawer
extends AbstractDrawer
implements java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
    This class provides a drawer that draws grid lines in the visible area.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai
